channel.description: Recent content in ðŸ’»Tech on Atharva Shah

item.title: AWS Security Best Practices: A Case Study on IAM
item.description: Learn AWS security best practices, including customer responsibilities, IAM risks, secure access to services, root account safeguarding, and credential management.

item.title: AWS Security Best Practices: A Case Study on EC2
item.description: Case Study Scenario Analytica Soft Pty Ltd (ASPT) - analyticasoft.com.au is a global analytics company with its head office in Australia. ASPT is planning to migrate its static website hosting to AWS Cloud in the first phase. One of the requirements is to setup a storage service on the cloud to store documents and videos. These documents will be available to the registered users as Presigned URLs. As part of the cloud team, your task is to analyze and recommend suitable AWS cloud services to meet ASPT’s requirements.

item.title: 35 AWS Cheatsheets To Speedrun Certification
item.description: Dump of all the useful notes for SAA-C03 AWS Certification

item.title: How I Stay Organized In Chrome
item.description: Super simple tab management to take the hassle of tab hoarding out of your life. Partizion is a Chrome extension to simplify your organization and boost your productivity.

item.title: Awesome Hugo Shortcodes For Your Websites
item.description: Awesome hugo shortcodes I am running to power this site. Lightweight, fast and easy to use. Everything from galleries, blockquotes, spotify embeds and more.

item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to Testing Django Applications
item.description: Everything from setting up the testing environment to mastering unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

item.title: Sales Data Analysis with Python
item.description: This tutorial explores data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and model building for sales data analysis.

item.title: Digital Product Series Launch!
item.description: Most asked Python Interview questions (Data Structures and Algorithms) are now available on Gumroad!

item.title: Setting Up CI/CD to Netlify for Static Sites via Github
item.description: A step-by-step beginner friendly guide to setting up CI/CD to Netlify for static sites like Hugo, Jekyll, etc. Code snippets for Github actions included.

item.description: Functional requirements of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Ultimate Django ORM Cheatsheet + Exercises
item.description: Master Django ORM with exercises to level up database querying, model relationships, aggregations, annotations skills.

item.title: UML Diagrams with ChatGPT: Step-by-Step Tutorial
item.description: 5 Step process to use ChatGPT to generate UML diagrams for your projects in just a few clicks. Easy to follow instructions with visual illustrations.

item.title: What I am Learning in 2023
item.description: Diving into the Latest Developments in React.js, Docker, AWS, Django and FastAPI. My personal goals for the year along with topic breakup.

item.title: Accelerating into the Future: e/acc Ruminations
item.description: A long form essay on Navigating the Intersection of Technology and Humanity through the Lens of Accelerationism.

item.title: Celebrating victory at CRIF Hackathon 2023
item.description: Developer experience at CRIF Hackathon 2023. We built a News Media Analysis Utility leveraging NLP, Text Processing, and Visualization with Tableau.
